events.name: Former Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan arrested
events.wd_label: Former Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan arrested
events.wd_description: Former Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan was arrested after appearing in court in Islamabad to face charges in a separate corruption case.
events.description: Former Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan was arrested after appearing in court in Islamabad to face charges in a separate corruption case.

events.name: Arrest details
events.wd_description: Security forces in riot gear dragged Imran Khan into an armored vehicle after he appeared in court.
events.description: Security forces in riot gear dragged Imran Khan into an armored vehicle after he appeared in court.

events.name: Protests and violence
events.wd_description: Protests erupted across the country, with accusations against the army for orchestrating his detention. One protester was shot dead in Quetta.
events.description: Protests erupted across the country, with accusations against the army for orchestrating his detention. One protester was shot dead in Quetta.

events.name: Court appearance and charges
events.wd_description: Imran Khan traveled to Islamabad to request bail in two corruption cases among many involving corruption, sedition, and terrorism.
events.description: Imran Khan traveled to Islamabad to request bail in two corruption cases among many involving corruption, sedition, and terrorism.

events.name: Arrest by National Accountability Bureau
events.wd_description: Agents from the National Accountability Bureau arrested Khan immediately after he entered the court premises.
events.description: Agents from the National Accountability Bureau arrested Khan immediately after he entered the court premises.

events.name: Alleged Russian strike in Dnipro
events.wd_description: An alleged Russian strike in a residential area of Dnipro, Ukraine, killed a two-year-old girl and left 22 people injured.
events.description: An alleged Russian strike in a residential area of Dnipro, Ukraine, killed a two-year-old girl and left 22 people injured.

events.name: Details of the strike
events.wd_description: The girl's body was pulled from the rubble of a house in the Pidhorodneska community. Five of the injured were children, with three boys in critical condition.
events.description: The girl's body was pulled from the rubble of a house in the Pidhorodneska community. Five of the injured were children, with three boys in critical condition.

events.name: Zelensky's response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky blamed Russia for the attack, describing it as deliberate, although Russia has previously denied targeting residential areas.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky blamed Russia for the attack, describing it as deliberate, although Russia has previously denied targeting residential areas.

events.name: Explosions in Kyiv
events.wd_description: Explosions were heard in Kyiv, where the air defense system was activated again.
events.description: Explosions were heard in Kyiv, where the air defense system was activated again.

events.name: Africa's largest oil refinery opens in Nigeria
events.wd_label: Africa's largest oil refinery opens in Nigeria
events.wd_description: The biggest oil refinery ever built in Africa opened in Nigeria, aiming to alleviate chronic fuel shortages. Although the plant is not yet operational, it can produce 650,000 barrels of petroleum products daily.
events.description: The biggest oil refinery ever built in Africa opened in Nigeria, aiming to alleviate chronic fuel shortages. Although the plant is not yet operational, it can produce 650,000 barrels of petroleum products daily.

events.name: Nigeria's fuel import situation
events.wd_description: Nigeria, a major oil producer, exports most of its oil while importing refined fuel for domestic use.
events.description: Nigeria, a major oil producer, exports most of its oil while importing refined fuel for domestic use.

events.name: Refinery details
events.wd_description: The refinery includes a power station, deep seaport, and fertilizer plant. Building the plant cost $19bn (£15.2bn).
events.description: The refinery includes a power station, deep seaport, and fertilizer plant. Building the plant cost $19bn (£15.2bn).

events.name: Statement by Aliko Dangote
events.wd_description: Aliko Dangote, the owner of the refinery and the richest man in Africa, stated that the first goal is to ramp up production to satisfy the country's needs this year.
events.description: Aliko Dangote, the owner of the refinery and the richest man in Africa, stated that the first goal is to ramp up production to satisfy the country's needs this year.

events.name: Cornell study on U.S. EV battery production and sustainability
events.wd_label: Cornell study on U.S. EV battery production and sustainability
events.wd_description: A Cornell study examines the long-term energy and sustainability prospects of U.S. EV battery production and highlights policy approaches for building a more resilient battery supply chain.
events.description: A Cornell study examines the long-term energy and sustainability prospects of U.S. EV battery production and highlights policy approaches for building a more resilient battery supply chain.

events.name: Federal government incentives
events.wd_description: The federal government is incentivizing the expansion of domestic electric-vehicle battery manufacturing to reduce dependence on foreign imports and unpredictable global supply chains.
events.description: The federal government is incentivizing the expansion of domestic electric-vehicle battery manufacturing to reduce dependence on foreign imports and unpredictable global supply chains.

events.name: Study publication
events.wd_description: A study published in Science Advances provides a comprehensive energy and environmental analysis of reshoring lithium-ion EV batteries, considering the entire life cycle.
events.description: A study published in Science Advances provides a comprehensive energy and environmental analysis of reshoring lithium-ion EV batteries, considering the entire life cycle.

events.name: Benefits of reshoring
events.wd_description: Reshoring could reduce the overall carbon footprint of U.S. EV batteries and the energy needed to produce them, with benefits varying based on technology advances, supply chain restructuring, and EV adoption.
events.description: Reshoring could reduce the overall carbon footprint of U.S. EV batteries and the energy needed to produce them, with benefits varying based on technology advances, supply chain restructuring, and EV adoption.

events.name: Importance of recycled materials
events.wd_description: Utilizing recycled aluminum and nickel can reduce the carbon footprint by up to 26% for the pre-pandemic U.S. electric vehicle fleet.
events.description: Utilizing recycled aluminum and nickel can reduce the carbon footprint by up to 26% for the pre-pandemic U.S. electric vehicle fleet.

events.name: Ally-shoring strategy
events.wd_description: The study examined an ally-shoring strategy, reallocating production capacities for refined metals and battery components to Japan, South Korea, and European Union countries.
events.description: The study examined an ally-shoring strategy, reallocating production capacities for refined metals and battery components to Japan, South Korea, and European Union countries.

events.name: Key findings
events.wd_description: Key findings include a potential 27% reduction in carbon footprint by increasing onshoring and ally production, enhanced sustainability with renewable energy, and a 54% improvement in climate change mitigation with strategic integration.
events.description: Key findings include a potential 27% reduction in carbon footprint by increasing onshoring and ally production, enhanced sustainability with renewable energy, and a 54% improvement in climate change mitigation with strategic integration.

events.name: Environmental tradeoffs
events.wd_description: Reshoring could reduce ecotoxicity and particulate matter formation by over 30% from secondary nickel supply, but may decrease performance in ozone formation, ozone depletion, and ionizing radiation due to increased overseas transportation distance.
events.description: Reshoring could reduce ecotoxicity and particulate matter formation by over 30% from secondary nickel supply, but may decrease performance in ozone formation, ozone depletion, and ionizing radiation due to increased overseas transportation distance.

events.name: Importance of advanced modeling
events.wd_description: Advanced modeling and systems analysis are essential for considering environmental tradeoffs in lithium-ion battery production and securing a resilient value chain amidst uncertain markets and evolving technologies.
events.description: Advanced modeling and systems analysis are essential for considering environmental tradeoffs in lithium-ion battery production and securing a resilient value chain amidst uncertain markets and evolving technologies.
